sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Accordion, AccordionDetails, AccordionSummary, Box, Divider, Typography, Stack, Select, MenuItem, FormControl, InputLabel} from '@mui/material' import ExpandMoreIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ExpandMore'; import combatValues from "../data/factions.json" function UnitColumn(props) { const [totalHits, setTotalHits] = useState(0); const [shipNumber, setShipNumber] = useState(0); return ( {`Number of ${props.unit}s`} }> Rolls ... {totalHits} Total Hits ) } export default UnitColumn
